title: Correction: Cross-cultural translation and psychometric validation of the French version of the Fear-Avoidance Components Scale (FACS)
content: by Arnaud Duport, Sonia Bédard, Catherine Raynauld, Martine Bordeleau, Randy Neblett, Frédéric Balg, Hervé Devanne, Guillaume Léonard
author: Arnaud Duport
